title: EBanking Management System
description: This project develops a secure, scalable e-banking system for customers, bank managers, and admins. It also addresses scalability using Spring Boot (backend), J2EE, Spring Data JPA, and MySQL, ensuring smooth performance with pagination.

title: Talk-Mates
description: Developed a MERN stack-based chat application with a React-based UI and an Express.js/Node.js backend, featuring real-time messaging powered by Socket.io and admin-controlled functionalities for efficient user and conversation management.
